name: F.E.A.R. Final Blood.
description: FEAR: Final Blood is a fan made game in the FPS Creator engine. It's a self contained action/horror FPS game with very little story. You play as code-name Legacy, the final soldier born with incredible reflexes and it is your task to escape a secret research lab hidden on a distant island. Play through 7 locations as you fight Replica soldiers on your way to victory.
